Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class SimpleParityGame

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.SimpleParityGame
public class SimpleParityGame
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides a simple structure for parity games. A state of a simple parity game is just a natural number. All transitions are unlabeled.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SimpleParityGame()
    Constructs this empty parity game.

      public void validate() throws ValidationException
      Validates the structure of this game.
      Throws:

      Returns a simple parity game constructed from a parity game.
      Parameters:
      game - a parity game
      Returns:
      a simple parity game constructed from the parity game
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if game is not a parity game or its parity condition is invalid
